content.rendered:
Welcome to our Year 5 Class Page!

Our teachers are Mrs R Fearn (Mon/Tues) and Mrs R Henstock (Weds-Fri)

Our class is supported by Mrs A Beresford

This year our topics will be:

The Tudors

The Rainforest

The Polar Regions

What did the Greeks ever do for us?

The coast

 

Trips

To enrich our topics we aim to be visiting some very interesting places throughout the year such as: Murton Park, Cadbury’s World and Chester Zoo. Hopefully,  in May we shall also be going on our three day residential to Scarborough-which is always packed with lots of fun activities, (Mrs Fearn and Mrs Henstock enjoy the fish and chips best!)

Other activities

In the Autumn Term Year 5 the children take part in Bikeability, which is explained in the parental letter. They also start swimming in the Spring Term. Parents will be sent a letter with all the information required for this nearer to the start date.

Homework

The children will be given a homework matrix to complete at the beginning of every new topic. They also need to make sure that they fill out their reading logs and practice their times tables and spellings daily.

If you ever want to come in to speak to either Mrs Fearn or Mrs Henstock then our door is always open-please feel free to drop in.

jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome to our Year 6 Class Page! Welcome to year 6... your last year here at Springvale Primary! jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our Reading leaders are Mrs R Fearn and Mrs D Royston. Please ask them for more information or support where needed. At Springvale we foster a love of reading from an early age. To read our ‘intent statement’ for early Literacy and phonics, please see here: Early Literacy and Phonics…
